currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code in lowercase, indicating the currency denominating the account. Currently only `USD` is supported

org_id.description: ID of organization that is associated with the account. Filterable.

routing_number.description: ABA routing transit number associated with the account

tags.description: Array of tags associated with this account. Filterable.

userdata.description: Arbitrary user data that can be attached to the object

parameters.description: The ID of the account to pull pending transactions for
parameters.name: account_id

schema.description: The ID of the account to pull pending transactions for

account_id.description: The ID of the account to pull pending transactions for

ach_id.description: The ID of the ACH object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

amount.description: Transaction amount. Positive values indicate a credit while negative values indicate a debit. Note that transactions with type hold have an amount, but they do not change the balance.

balance.description: Account balance immediately after this transaction. Transactions of type hold do not affect the balance.

billpay_payment_id.description: The ID of the BillPay object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

book_id.description: The ID of the Book Transfer object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

card_id.description: The ID of the Card Object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

check_id.description: The ID of the Check Deposit object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

check_number.description: If this transaction is for an outbound check, the number of the check. Otherwise `null`

date.description: Date of the transaction, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DD'). Received directly from the bank, often without time zone adjustment. Might differ in date compared to `extended_timestamp` and `extended_timestamp_precise` due to timezones.

extended_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the transaction, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'). Limited availability. Always in UTC

extended_timestamp_precise.description: Timestamp of the transaction, ISO 8601 format with subsecond precision ('YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSS[SSS]Z'). The precision could be millisecond or microsecond depending on source data. Limited availability. Always in UTC.

incoming_ach_id.description: The ID of the Incoming ACH object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

incoming_wire_id.description: The ID of the Incoming Wire object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

issued_check_id.description: The ID of the Issued Check Object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

network_transfer_id.description: The ID of the Network Transfer that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

related_transfer_ids.description: The IDs of the related transactions, if any. Otherwise `null`

trace_id.description: A common id used to tie multiple, related transactions together. Currently used to connect `hold` and `hold_release` transactions to a `debit` and to link transactions to their related card events

type.description: Type of transaction. One of `charge`, `deposit`, `hold`, `hold_release`, `interest`, `payment`, `reversal`, `withdrawal`, or `null`

type_source.description: The type of payment that initiated this transaction, if any. One of `ach`, `bank`, `book`, `card`, `check`, or `wire`. Otherwise `null`. Limited availability.

wire_id.description: The ID of the Wire object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

account_id.description: Account ID

is_correction.description: Boolean indicating whether the document to be created is a correction of the existing tax document for the account

type.description: Type of tax document. Only `1099` is currently supported

account_id.description: Account ID

is_correction.description: Boolean indicating whether the document to be created is a correction of the existing tax document for the account

type.description: Type of tax document. Only `1099` is currently supported

account_id.description: Account ID
Account ID

url.description: URL to download the new statement

account_id.description: Account ID

account_product_id.description: Account Product used to create the account

additional_account_numbers.description: Invoice account numbers associated with the account

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address

available_balance.description: Available funds in this account. If not available, the value will be `null`

bank_id.description: ID of the bank with which the account is associated

business_ids.description: Array of IDs of Business objects representing all businesses that own this account. Always empty for personal accounts

currency.description: Three-letter ISO currency code in lowercase, indicating the currency denominating the account. Currently only `USD` is supported

current_balance.description: Last known account balance, with two-decimal precision. Note that some accounts may not support this field; if not available, the value will be `null`

funded.description: `true` if the account has ever been funded with an amount greater than $0, `false` otherwise

lock.description: Details related to account lock (returned only when `locked` is `true`).

additional_context.description: Optional text to include additional details for the reason to lock the account. It is recommend to include the payment ID such as the ACH id that is under investigation or the application ID for the customer. This additional context will be provided to your bank.

reason.description:
Reason for locking account. One of 
`transactions_being_investigated_wire`, 
`transactions_being_investigated_card`, 
`transactions_being_investigated_ACH`, 
`transactions_being_investigated_check_issued`, 
`transactions_being_investigated_check_deposit`, 
`identity_of_customer_being_investigated`.

When unlocking an account, a reason is not required.

locked.description: `true` if the account is in a locked state, `false` otherwise

mailing_address.description: Mailing address associated with the account

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address

name.description: Name of the person or company that owns the bank account

org_id.description: ID of the organization with which the account is associated. Filterable.

person_ids.description: Array of IDs of Person objects representing all people who own this account

physical_address.description: Physical address associated with the account

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address

primary_person_id.description: ID of the Person indicating the primary account holder

routing_number.description: ABA routing transit number associated with the account

status.description: The status of the account. One of `open`, `closed`, or `close_pending`

tags.description: Array of tags associated with this account. Filterable.

userdata.description: Arbitrary user data that can be attached to the object

additional_context.description: Optional text to include additional details for the reason to lock the account. It is recommend to include the payment ID such as the ACH id that is under investigation or the application ID for the customer. This additional context will be provided to your bank.

When unlocking an account, a reason is not required.

average_balance.description: Average account balance for the month

month.description: Month for this average, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM')

current_balance.description: Last current balance of the day

date.description: Date for this balance, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DD')
Statement date in `YYYY-MM` format. Required when `type` is `monthly`.

year.description: Statement year in `YYYY` format. Required when `type` is `1099`.

type.description: Type of statement. One of: `1099`. Filterable.

ach_id.description: The ID of the ACH object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

amount.description: Transaction amount. Positive values indicate a credit while negative values indicate a debit. Note that transactions with type hold have an amount, but they do not change the balance.

balance.description: Account balance immediately after this transaction. Transactions of type hold do not affect the balance.

billpay_payment_id.description: The ID of the BillPay object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

book_id.description: The ID of the Book Transfer object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

card_id.description: The ID of the Card Object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

category.description: One of: `interest`, `fees`, or `null`. Update this field to indicate if the transaction is an interest or fee payment

check_id.description: The ID of the Check Deposit object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

check_number.description: If this transaction is for an outbound check, the number of the check. Otherwise `null`

date.description: Date of the transaction, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DD'). Received directly from the bank, often without time zone adjustment. Might differ in date compared to `extended_timestamp` and `extended_timestamp_precise` due to timezones.

extended_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the transaction, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'). Limited availability. Always in UTC

extended_timestamp_precise.description: Timestamp of the transaction, ISO 8601 format with subsecond precision ('YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSS[SSS]Z'). The precision could be millisecond or microsecond depending on source data. Limited availability. Always in UTC.

fingerprint.description: A unique fingerprint for this transaction

human_readable_description.description: A user-friendly description. Note, there may be a short period (less than 60 seconds) after a transaction is accessible through our API where this field is not yet populated.

incoming_ach_id.description: The ID of the Incoming ACH object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

incoming_wire.description: Data related to the wire that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

incoming_wire_id.description: The ID of the Incoming Wire object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

issued_check_id.description: The ID of the Issued Check Object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

network_transfer_id.description: The ID of the Network Transfer that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

related_transfer_ids.description: The IDs of the related transactions, if any. Otherwise `null`

trace_id.description: A common id used to tie multiple, related transactions together. Currently used to connect `hold` and `hold_release` transactions to a `debit` and to link transactions to their related card events. Filterable.

type.description: Type of transaction. One of `charge`, `deposit`, `hold`, `hold_release`, `interest`, `payment`, `reversal`, `withdrawal`, or `null`. Filterable.

type_source.description: The type of payment that initiated this transaction, if any. One of `ach`, `bank`, `book`, `card`, `check`, or `wire`. Otherwise `null`. Limited availability.

userdata.description: Arbitrary user data that can be attached to the object

wire.description: For wire transactions, the Fedwire description, if any. Otherwise `null`.

wire_id.description: The ID of the Wire object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

account_id.description: ID of account that is associated with the account lock. Filterable.

bank_id.description: ID of bank that is associated with the account lock. Filterable.

locked.description: `true` if the account lock is active. Filterable.

org_id.description: ID of organization that is associated with the account lock. Filterable.

account_id.description: ID of the Account associated with the Deposit Sweep object

bank_id.description: ID of the bank for the deposit sweep account

network.description: Name of the deposit sweep network associated with the object

network_account_id.description: Identifier used with the network for the deposit sweep account

opted_in.description: Boolean identifying whether the account is currently opted in to the Enhanced FDIC insurance program

sweep_balance.description: Current sweep balance reported to the deposit sweep network, with two decimal precision. This will be null when the account has not been reported to the network.

threshold_balance.description: Threshold balance over which funds should be reported to the deposit sweep network, with two decimal precision. Example: If the `current_balance` of an account was $20 and the `threshold_balance` was $15, a sweep balance of $5 would be reported to the network.

data.footnote: In case of errors or questions about your electronic transfers...

account_id.description: Specific Account ID to apply statement configuration; if omitted, applies to all accounts

apy.description: Annual Percentage Yield to be displayed on statements generated with this configuration. Must be non-negative. APY will be displayed with two-decimal precision and must be provided with two-decimal precision. The provided `apy` is taken as a percentage, e.g. `3.50` would indicate an APY of 3.50%

email_address.description: Customer support email address to appear on statements

footnote.description: Field to add footnote language, including Reg E Customer Complaint Information & Language. See suggested template. Whatever is entered into this field will appear as plain text at the bottom of the statement. Note, the copy included in this field is subject to approval by your partner bank.

logo_file_id.description: ID of the File containing the logo to appear on statements. Allowed image formats are PNG, JPEG and TIFF. Image will be scaled down to fit in a 360x54 region.

org_legal_name.description: Legal name of your business to appear on statements

phone_number.description: Customer support phone number to appear on statements

physical_address.description: Address object representing the physical address of your business which will appear on statements

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address

support_url.description: Customer support website to appear on statements

account_id.description: Specific Account ID to apply statement configuration; if omitted, applies to all accounts

apy.description: Annual Percentage Yield to be displayed on statements generated with this configuration. Must be non-negative. APY will be displayed with two-decimal precision and must be provided with two-decimal precision. The provided `apy` is taken as a percentage, e.g. `3.50` would indicate an APY of 3.50%

email_address.description: Customer support email address to appear on statements

footnote.description: Field to add footnote language, including Reg E Customer Complaint Information & Language. See suggested template. Whatever is entered into this field will appear as plain text at the bottom of the statement. Note, the copy included in this field is subject to approval by your partner bank.

logo_file_id.description: ID of the File containing the logo to appear on statements. Allowed image formats are PNG, JPEG and TIFF. Image will be scaled down to fit in a 360x54 region.

org_legal_name.description: Legal name of your business to appear on statements

phone_number.description: Customer support phone number to appear on statements

physical_address.description: Address object representing the physical address of your business which will appear on statements

street_line_2.description: Optional second line of the address

support_url.description: Customer support website to appear on statements

account_id.description: Account ID

ach_id.description: The ID of the ACH object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

amount.description: Transaction amount. Positive values indicate a credit while negative values indicate a debit. Note that transactions with type hold have an amount, but they do not change the balance.

balance.description: Account balance immediately after this transaction. Transactions of type hold do not affect the balance.

billpay_payment_id.description: The ID of the BillPay object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

book_id.description: The ID of the Book Transfer object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

card_id.description: The ID of the Card Object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

category.description: One of: `interest`, `fees`, or `null`. Update this field to indicate if the transaction is an interest or fee payment

check_id.description: The ID of the Check Deposit object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

check_number.description: If this transaction is for an outbound check, the number of the check. Otherwise `null`

date.description: Date of the transaction, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DD'). Received directly from the bank, often without time zone adjustment. Might differ in date compared to `extended_timestamp` and `extended_timestamp_precise` due to timezones.

extended_timestamp.description: Timestamp of the transaction, ISO 8601 format ('YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ'). Limited availability. Always in UTC

extended_timestamp_precise.description: Timestamp of the transaction, ISO 8601 format with subsecond precision ('YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.SSS[SSS]Z'). The precision could be millisecond or microsecond depending on source data. Limited availability. Always in UTC.

fingerprint.description: A unique fingerprint for this transaction

human_readable_description.description: A user-friendly description. Note, there may be a short period (less than 60 seconds) after a transaction is accessible through our API where this field is not yet populated.

incoming_ach_id.description: The ID of the Incoming ACH object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

incoming_wire.description: Data related to the wire that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`

incoming_wire_id.description: The ID of the Incoming ACH object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

issued_check_id.description: The ID of the Issued Check Object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

network_transfer_id.description: The ID of the Network Transfer that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.

related_transfer_ids.description: The IDs of the related transactions, if any. Otherwise `null`

trace_id.description: A common id used to tie multiple, related transactions together. Currently used to connect `hold` and `hold_release` transactions to a `debit` and to link transactions to their related card events. Filterable.

type.description: Type of transaction. One of `charge`, `deposit`, `hold`, `hold_release`, `interest`, `payment`, `reversal`, `withdrawal`, or `null`. Filterable.

type_source.description: The type of payment that initiated this transaction, if any. One of `ach`, `bank`, `book`, `card`, `check`, or `wire`. Otherwise `null`. Limited availability.

userdata.description: Arbitrary user data that can be attached to the object

wire.description: For wire transactions, the Fedwire description, if any. Otherwise `null`.

wire_id.description: The ID of the Wire object that originated this transaction, if any. Otherwise `null`. Filterable.
